TypeSignature.Value: .class nested public auto ansi abstract sealed beforefieldinit AVPlayerItem/Notifications extends System.Object

remarks.para: This is a static class which contains various helper methods that allow developers to observe events posted in the iOS notification hub ().
The methods defined in this class post events invoke the provided method or lambda with a parameter which contains strongly typed properties for the notification arguments.

MemberSignature.Value: public static Foundation.NSObject ObserveDidPlayToEndTime (EventHandler<Foundation.NSNotificationEventArgs> handler);

Docs.param: Method to invoke when the notification is posted.
Docs.summary: Strongly typed notification for the constant.
Docs.returns: Token object that can be used to stop receiving notifications by either disposing it or passing it to

.method public static hidebysig class Foundation.NSObject ObserveItemFailedToPlayToEndTime(class System.EventHandler`1<class AVFoundation.AVPlayerItemErrorEventArgs> handler) cil managed

Docs.param: Method to invoke when the notification is posted.
Docs.summary: Registers a method to be notified when the AVPlayerItemFailedToPlayToEndTimeNotification notification is posted.

returns.para: The returned NSObject represents the registered notification. Either call Dispose on the object to stop receiving notifications, or pass it to
